name: sweet-heart
effect:
Used on a friendly Pokémon
:   Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Very sweet chocolate.  
It restores the HP of one Pokémon
by only 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Very sweet chocolate.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon
by only 20 points.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate.
When consumed, it restores
20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate.
When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an
injured Pokémon.

A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate.
When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an
injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate.

injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate.
It can be used to restore 20 HP to a single Pokémon.
